questDescription->Colonists reported hearing something strange nearby — a deep, animalistic sound echoing through the land.

They couldn’t identify what creature made it, but it sounded large.

Very large.Something is out there... and it might be coming this way.

questDescription->It began with a sound — low, primal, and impossibly distant. It echoed across the trees, through rock and bone, as if the land itself remembered the beast.

Animals have fled. The air is colder. Even the wind seems to avoid the forest now.

Something ancient is stirring — watching, listening, drawing closer. You don’t know what it is… only that it was never meant to return.
